# NSAnimationTriggerOrderIn | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ AppKit ](/documentation/appkit)

- [ NSAnimationTriggerOrderIn ](/documentation/appkit/nsanimationtriggerorderin)

-  NSAnimationTriggerOrderIn 

Global Variable# NSAnimationTriggerOrderIn

macOS 10.5+

```
let NSAnimationTriggerOrderIn: String
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/appkit/nsanimationtriggerorderin#Discussion)

The key that references the transition animation used when a view becomes visible, either as a result of being inserted into the visible view hierarchy or as a result of the view no longer being set as hidden .
